channel.title: Removing objects
channel.description:
I know how to remove objects, but is there anyway to delete several objects without using much space?
What do I mean by this?
Is there anyway of deleting objects inbetween: X: 2164 - 2138 Y: 5091 - 5106 Without having to every single one with this? c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2164, 3138, 1, 10);
I'm trying to save space and would rather just have this entire area, empty.

item.title: Removing objects
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

Could I have the delete method. xD

Edit:
I made this but I wouldn’t know how to add the height or objectstate.

(absX >= x && absX <= x1 && absY >= y && absY <= y1)

Read full topic

item.title: Removing objects
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

map edit: client sided would be your best bet.

unless you create your own void (get the x coordinate(s) and y, then add a deletion method), such as:

public void deleteRegionalObject(int objectState, int x, int y, int x1, int y1, int heightLevel) { /** * Delete method here */ }
in the public void checkObjectSpawn void, add:
